statements: SELECT * FROM glacier_movement WHERE location='Alaska';
SELECT glacier_name, movement_distance FROM glacier_movement WHERE movement_type='Advancing';
SELECT glacier_id, glacier_name, movement_date FROM glacier_movement WHERE movement_distance > 10;
SELECT * FROM glacier_movement WHERE movement_distance BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY movement_distance DESC;
SELECT glacier_name, location, movement_type FROM glacier_movement WHERE movement_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY glacier_name ASC;
SELECT glacier_name, location, movement_type FROM glacier_movement WHERE movement_distance > 10 ORDER BY movement_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM glacier_movement WHERE movement_type = 'advancing' AND location = 'Alaska' ORDER BY glacier_name ASC;
SELECT glacier_name, movement_distance FROM glacier_movement WHERE movement_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY movement_distance DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT location) AS num_locations, AVG(movement_distance) AS avg_distance FROM glacier_movement GROUP BY movement_type;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM glacier_movement WHERE movement_type = 'retreating' ORDER BY location ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM glaciers;
SELECT name, area_sq_km FROM glaciers WHERE area_sq_km > 100;
SELECT location, name FROM glaciers WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM glacier_movements ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT glacier_id, COUNT(*) FROM glacier_movements GROUP BY glacier_id;
SELECT id, name, location, area_sq_km FROM glaciers WHERE location = 'Alaska' ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM glaciers WHERE area_sq_km > 1000 ORDER BY area_sq_km ASC;
SELECT id, name, location FROM glaciers WHERE area_sq_km BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY location, name;
SELECT g.id, g.name, gm.timestamp, gm.movement_direction FROM glaciers g JOIN glacier_movements gm ON g.id = gm.glacier_id WHERE gm.timestamp > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY gm.timestamp DESC;

SELECT g.id AS glacier_id, g.name AS glacier_name, gm.movement_id, gm.timestamp, gm.movement_direction FROM glaciers g INNER JOIN glacier_movements gm ON g.id = gm.glacier_id WHERE gm.movement_direction = 'Advance' ORDER BY gm.timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM glaciers;
SELECT glacier_name, location FROM glaciers;
SELECT glacial_area FROM glaciers WHERE location='Himalayas';
SELECT glacier_id, movement_date, movement_distance FROM glacier_movements ORDER BY movement_date DESC;
SELECT image_id, image_date FROM satellite_images WHERE captured_by_sensor='Landsat';
SELECT * FROM glaciers WHERE location = 'Alaska' ORDER BY glacier_name DESC;
SELECT glacier_name, glacial_area FROM glaciers WHERE glacial_area > 1000 ORDER BY glacial_area ASC;
SELECT glacier_name, location, movement_distance FROM glaciers JOIN glacier_movements ON glaciers.id = glacier_movements.glacier_id WHERE movement_distance < 5 ORDER BY movement_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images WHERE image_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY image_date DESC;

SELECT glaciers.glacier_name, satellite_images.image_path, satellite_images.captured_by_sensor FROM glaciers JOIN satellite_images ON glaciers.id = satellite_images.image_id WHERE glacier_name LIKE '%Glacier%' ORDER BY image_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM GlacierImages;
SELECT image_url, capture_date FROM GlacierImages WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT location_id, region FROM GlacierLocations ORDER BY region;
SELECT * FROM GlacierMovement WHERE movement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31';
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_date FROM GlacierAnalysis WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT * FROM GlacierImages ORDER BY capture_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT image_url FROM GlacierImages WHERE capture_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT location_id, region FROM GlacierLocations WHERE latitude > 60 AND longitude < -130
SELECT movement_distance FROM GlacierMovement WHERE movement_id IN (SELECT movement_id FROM GlacierAnalysis WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%melting%')
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_date FROM GlacierAnalysis WHERE analysis_result IS NOT NULL ORDER BY analysis_date
SELECT * FROM glacier_locations LIMIT 5;
SELECT glacier_id, location_name FROM glacier_locations WHERE latitude > 0;
SELECT * FROM glacier_movements WHERE movement_type = 'retreat' ORDER BY movement_date DESC;
SELECT stat_type, stat_value FROM glacier_statistics WHERE stat_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM glacier_researchers ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM glacier_locations ORDER BY location_name DESC, latitude ASC
SELECT glacier_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM glacier_locations WHERE latitude > 45
SELECT location_name, glacier_id, latitude, longitude FROM glacier_locations WHERE location_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM glacier_images JOIN glacier_locations ON glacier_images.glacier_id = glacier_locations.glacier_id WHERE image_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT glacier_id, movement_date, movement_type FROM glacier_movements ORDER BY movement_date DESC
